alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Inland Charlotte (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Charlotte County through 830 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charlotte County Airport, or near Punta Gorda, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Charlotte County Airport, Pirate Harbor, Solana, Tropical Gulf Acres, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, and Charlotte Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
